Text:
how you you burn this??

the image file wont work in nero??

I suspect the "imagefile" is actually a cue file. 

Download the freeware Cue Splitter and use that to split the cd into tracks which u then burn as a usual audio cd.

no sorry... my bad... i didn realise u must have meant the rar file... or did u?

however... u'll need Winrar or similar to unpack the rar file... then u can burn it :)
er, yeah. disappointing. why put all the tracks as one large track? pointless and a waste of time downloading - and it took a long time as well!
